pr_title: Remove unused scss definitions and convert renaming to normal css.

timeline.message: Remove unused scss definitions and convert renaming to normal css.

timeline.bodyText: node-sass is a quite common problem area when people are building.. are we no longer using this? or is it just no longer an explicit dep?
timeline.author: codefromthecrypt

replies.bodyText: We're no longer using it with this PR - I think there was a ton of SCSS a while ago but now none :)
replies.author: anuraaga
